lead_paragraph: The amount of the active ingredient in Chinese red yeast rice varies widely, a study has found, and some tested products contained a substance that may be toxic to the kidneys.
snippet: The amount of the active ingredient in Chinese red yeast rice varies widely, a study has found, and some tested products contained a substance that may be toxic to the kidneys.

headline.main: Nostrums: Caution Urged on Cholesterol-Lowering Supplement
headline.seo: Red Yeast Rice to Lower Cholesterol May Contain Toxin - Vital Signs
headline.print_headline: NOSTRUMS: Caution on Red Yeast Rice for Cholesterol
